title: Delay between ignition visualization and ros topics

content.raw:
I’ve been running

‌

`ign launch -v 4 tunnel_circuit_practice.ign worldName:=tunnel_circuit_practice_02 robotName1:=X2 robotConfig1:=X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1` and there seems to be a delay problem between what is displayed on the ignition window and the ROS topics. 

In the figure attached, seems like Ignition has a buffer and therefore keeps displaying the robots outside the tunnel even when the camera onboard is showing the vehicle is already inside the tunnel. Not sure if down the road it will be a problem but thought I’ll point it out. 

‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3710516570-delay.png)

In the figure attached, seems like Ignition has a buffer and therefore keeps displaying the robots outside the tunnel even when the camera onboard is showing the vehicle is already inside the tunnel. Not sure if down the road it will be a problem but thought I’ll point it out.
